action.title: Immunize Patient for Rotavirus - No Doses
action.description: Provide Rotavirus immunizations – using the "Rotavirus vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (Scheme depends on product)

expression.description: "Rotavirus vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses and less than 24 months old"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Rotavirus because no doses

action.title: Immunize Patient for Rotavirus - 1 Rotarix dose previously given
action.description: Provide Rotavirus immunizations – using the "Rotatrix vaccine immunization schedule" – minimum of 4 weeks after previous dose

expression.description: "Rotarix vaccine given 1 dose in immunization history" = "1 Rotarix dose"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with Rotatrix 2nd dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for Rotavirus - 2 RotaTeq/Rotavac
action.description: Provide Rotavirus immunizations – using the "Rotatrix vaccine immunization schedule" – minimum of 4 weeks after previous dose

expression.description: "RotaTeq/Rotavac vaccine given 1 dose in immunization history" = "1 RotaTeq/Rotavac dose"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with RotaTeq or Rotavac 2nd dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for Rotavirus - 3 RotaTeq/Rotavac
action.description: Provide Rotavirus immunizations – using the "Rotatrix vaccine immunization schedule" – minimum of 4 weeks after previous dose

expression.description: "RotaTeq vaccine given 1 dose in immunization history" = "2 RotaTeq/Rotavac dose"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with RotaTeq or Rotavac 3rd dose
